TopicTitle: Anyone knows where can I find this awesome skybox for KSP?

Articles.Content:
Pretty sure you can use a image to make a skybox. not sure but this may help http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/44135-0-21-x-Universe-Replacer-v4-0?highlight=Universe+Replacer

Edited October 22, 2015 by Dfthu

Yes, you can use any images to make skyboxes. Try downloading TextureReplacer, then looking at the labels on the images in the 'Default' folder. There should be six images saying things like 'GalaxyTex_...'. Try looking around the TextureReplacer threads (or try the older UniverseReplacer one) for that exact image.

Pretty sure you can use a imgue to make a skybox. not sure but this may help http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/44135-0-21-x-Universe-Replacer-v4-0?highlight=Universe+Replacer

Universe Replacer is two years out of date. Use TextureReplacer instead, as Dfthu said.
